title: Update UI color scheme to black and red theme

requirements.text: Update the dark mode color palette in frontend/index.css to use a black and red color scheme, replacing the current OKLCH color variables with black backgrounds and red accent colors for primary elements, buttons, and interactive components

quotes: make the app black and red

acceptanceCriteria: Primary color scheme uses red tones instead of current colors
Background colors use true black or near-black values
Text maintains sufficient contrast for readability on black backgrounds
Interactive elements (buttons, links, badges) use red accent colors
All CSS color variables are updated to reflect black and red theme

requirements.text: Update the Tailwind CSS configuration in frontend/tailwind.config.js to reflect the black and red color scheme, ensuring all custom theme colors use appropriate black and red values that integrate with the updated CSS variables

quotes: make the app black and red

acceptanceCriteria: Tailwind theme colors are updated to match the black and red palette
All color references in the config align with the updated CSS variables
Chart colors maintain sufficient contrast on black backgrounds

constraints: Do not change component structure or functionality
Maintain sufficient contrast ratios for accessibility (WCAG AA minimum)
Preserve all existing features and interactions
